actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration with amendment, H. Rept. 94-1450.
Measure called up as privileged matter in House.

official_title: A resolution authorizing appointment of a special counsel to represent the Sergeant at Arms in the case of Pressler v. Simon et al.

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration with amendment, H. Rept. 94-1450) Authorizes the Sergeant at Arms to employ with the approval of the Speaker and the chairman of the Committee on House Administration a special counsel to represent the Sergeant at Arms in all civil proceedings relating to the pending action entitled Larry Pressler against William E. Silmon, et al., civil action numbered 76-0782 in the United States District Court for the District of Columbia, in which action the Sergeant at Arms is named as a defendant.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing appointment of a special counsel to represent the Sergeant at Arms in the case of Pressler v. Simon et al.
